languages.text: "Зафиксировано бого... Отмена. Прогноз указывает на неизбежность конфронтации. Необходимость в ведении протокола отсутствует". {n}Паскаль поудобнее перехватывает оружие. Визор окрашивается багрянцем, и на груди Вортена возникает пятнышко прицельного лазера.{/n}

"I am registering a Category— aborted. Confrontation estimated as imminent. Blasphemy registration unnecessary." {n}Pasqal adjusts the grip on his weapon. His visor turns scarlet, and the dot of his aiming laser lights up on Worten's chest.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Зафиксировано бого... Отмена. Прогноз указывает на неизбежность конфронтации. Необходимость в ведении протокола отсутствует". {n}Паскаль поудобнее перехватывает оружие. Визор окрашивается багрянцем, и на груди Вортена возникает пятнышко прицельного лазера.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I am recording a blasph— Aborted. My calculations point to an imminent confrontation. Keeping a record is unnecessary." {n}Pasqal adjusts his grip on his weapon for more comfort. His visor turns scarlet, and the spot of an aiming laser lights up on Worten's chest.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am recording a blasph— Aborted. My calculations point to an imminent confrontation. Keeping a record is unnecessary." {n}Pasqal adjusts his grip on his weapon for more comfort. His visor turns scarlet, and the spot of an aiming laser lights up on Worten's chest.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am recording a blasph— Aborted. My calculations point to an imminent confrontation. Keeping a record is unnecessary." {n}Pasqal adjusts his grip on his weapon for more comfort. His visor turns scarlet and the spot of an aiming laser lights up on Worten's chest.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am registering a Category— aborted. Confrontation estimated as imminent. Blasphemy registration unnecessary." {n}Pasqal adjusts the grip on his weapon. His visor turns scarlet, and the dot of his aiming laser lights up on Worten's chest.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am registering a Category— aborted. Confrontation estimated as imminent. Blasphemy registration unnecessary." {n}Pasqal adjusts the grip on his weapon. His visor turns scarlet, and the dot of his aiming laser lights up on Worten's chest.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “检测到亵渎性——就此中止。一场恶战迫在眉睫，已经没必要继续记录亵渎行为了。”{n}帕斯卡调节着武器的握把，面甲变成了血红色，激光瞄准镜的红点在沃尔腾的胸口上亮了起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am registering a Category— aborted. Confrontation estimated as imminent. Blasphemy registration unnecessary." {n}Pasqal adjusts the grip on his weapon. His visor turns scarlet, and the dot of his aiming laser lights up on Worten's chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “正在录制亵渎性——就此中止。根据我的计算，一场恶战迫在眉睫，没有必要继续记录了。”{n}帕斯卡调节着武器的握把，面甲变成了血红色，激光瞄准镜在沃尔腾的胸口上亮了起来。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich verzeichne eine blasphem- Abgebrochen. Meine Berechnungen weisen auf eine unmittelbar bevorstehende Konfrontation hin. Eine Aufzeichnung ist nicht erforderlich." {n}Pasqal verlagert die Hand an seiner Waffe leicht. Sein Visor färbt sich scharlachrot und der Punkt seines Ziellasers erscheint auf Wortens Brust.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am registering a Category— aborted. Confrontation estimated as imminent. Blasphemy registration unnecessary." {n}Pasqal adjusts the grip on his weapon. His visor turns scarlet, and the dot of his aiming laser lights up on Worten's chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich verzeichne eine blasphem- Abgebrochen. Meine Berechnungen weisen auf eine unmittelbar bevorstehende Konfrontation hin. Eine Aufzeichnung ist nicht erforderlich." {n}Pasqal verlagert die Hand an seiner Waffe leicht. Sein Visor färbt sich scharlachrot und der Punkt eines Ziellasers erscheint auf Wortens Brust.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Estoy registrando una blasf... Cancelado. Mis cómputos indican una confrontación inminente. No hay necesidad de registrar la blasfemia». {n}Pasqal afianza el arma en sus manos. Su visor se vuelve escarlata y el luminoso punto de una mira láser aparece en el pecho de Worten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am registering a Category— aborted. Confrontation estimated as imminent. Blasphemy registration unnecessary." {n}Pasqal adjusts the grip on his weapon. His visor turns scarlet, and the dot of his aiming laser lights up on Worten's chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Estoy registrando una blasf— Cancelado. Mis cómputos indican una confrontación inminente. No hay necesidad de documentarlo». {n}Pasqal afianza el arma en sus manos. Su visor se vuelve escarlata y el luminoso punto de una mira láser aparece en el pecho de Worten.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je détecte une... Annulation. Mes calculs indiquent une confrontation imminente. Inutile d'enregistrer le blasphème. » {n}Pasqal ajuste sa prise sur son arme. Sa visière vire au rouge et le point lumineux d'un laser apparaît sur la poitrine de Worten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am registering a Category— aborted. Confrontation estimated as imminent. Blasphemy registration unnecessary." {n}Pasqal adjusts the grip on his weapon. His visor turns scarlet, and the dot of his aiming laser lights up on Worten's chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'enregistre un blasph... Annulation. Mes calculs indiquent une confrontation imminente. Inutile d'en garder une trace. » {n}Pasqal ajuste sa prise en main pour tenir son arme de façon plus confortable. Sa visière vire au rouge et le point lumineux d'un laser apparaît sur la poitrine de Worten.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「不敬を登録…中止。私の計算では、対決は間近に迫っている。記録は不要だ」{n}パスカルは握りやすくするため武器のグリップを調整すると、彼のバイザーが緋色に変わり、ヴォルテンの胸に照準レーザーのスポットが灯る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am registering a Category— aborted. Confrontation estimated as imminent. Blasphemy registration unnecessary." {n}Pasqal adjusts the grip on his weapon. His visor turns scarlet, and the dot of his aiming laser lights up on Worten's chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「不敬を登録…中止。私の計算では、対決は間近に迫っている。記録は不要だ」{n}パスカルは握りやすくするため武器のグリップを調整すると、彼のバイザーが緋色に変わり、ヴォルテンの胸に照準レーザーのスポットが灯る。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Birinci Kategori dine... Sonuçsuz. Yüzleşmenin an meselesi olduğu tahmin ediliyor. Dine aykırılığın kayda geçirilmesine gerek bulunmuyor." {n}Pasqal, silahının kabzasını ayarlıyor. Vizörünün kızıla dönmesiyle lazer nişangâhının noktası, Worten'ın göğsünü aydınlatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am registering a Category— aborted. Confrontation estimated as imminent. Blasphemy registration unnecessary." {n}Pasqal adjusts the grip on his weapon. His visor turns scarlet, and the dot of his aiming laser lights up on Worten's chest.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bir Kategori kaydediyorum: Sonuçsuz. Yüzleşmenin an meselesi olduğu tahmin ediliyor. Günahkârlık kaydına gerek bulunmuyor." {n}Pasqal, silahının kabzasını ayarlıyor. Vizörünün kızıla dönmesiyle lazer nişangâhının noktası, Worten'ın göğsünü aydınlatıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
